@stepelu are you installing the CUDA8 version? I am suspecting you installed pytorch with:

conda install pytorch torchvision -c soumith

The correct command for pascal GPUs is:

conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith

body:
@stepelu are you installing the CUDA8 version? I am suspecting you installed pytorch with:

```
conda install pytorch torchvision -c soumith
```

The correct command for pascal GPUs is:
```
conda install pytorch torchvision cuda80 -c soumith
```
